text: The Director of the Department of Corrections shall state in writing the terms and conditions under which a person granted work release privileges may be released from actual custody during the time necessary to proceed to the person's place of employment or other authorized places, perform specified activities, and return to a place of confinement designated by the Director of the Department of Corrections.
